document.text:
From: 
To:  
Subject: RE: Subpoena request 
Date: Thu, 10 Oct 2019 15:39:53 +0000 
I received a  copy of the autopsy report from Thanks for the assistance. 
From:
Sent: Friday, September 27, 2019 10:56 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Subpoena request 
Have you reached out to ? We just needed to submit a request not a  subpoena, and BOP did as well. 
From: 
Sent: Friday, September 27, 2019 10:54 AM 
To: 
Subject: Re: Subpoena request 
OCME requires a subpoena which we would request from your office. 
On Sep 27, 2019, at 10:44 AM, wrote: 
Hi, unfortunately we can't provide it to you directly but if you request it from OCME they will be able to provide it to 
you. Let me know if you need a contact ( their GC, is the right person - (OCME) 
>). 
From:
Sent: Friday, September 27, 2019 9:28 AM 
To:', 
Subject: Re: Subpoena request 
Are you guys able to turn over the requested documents yet. I'm still waiting to close this case out. 
On Aug 19, 2019, at 12:13 PM, 
We are requesting that information today and will give it to you when we get it. 
wrote: 
In the meantime, we had heard that the Marshals may have a form that Epstein may have/may not have signed noting 
he had suicidal tendencies, and this happened around 8/1. Do you know anything about this? 
Give me a call with any questions, thanks. 
From:
Sent: Monday, August 19, 2019 11:55 AM 
To: 
Subject: FW: Subpoena request 
EFTA00021323

From: 
Sent: Monday, August 19, 2019 11:48 AM 
To: 
Subject: FW: Subpoena request 
AUSAI advised that I should reach out to you guys for the below: 
We need to obtain a copy of the death certificate and autopsy report to close out Jeffrey Epstein's case. Can I please 
get subpoenas for both? 
Death Certificate: 
Office Of Vital Records 
Bureau of Vital Statistics 
New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene 
Autopsy Report: 
New York City Office of Chief Medical Examiner 
You can use my info for the return: 
Thank you 
Supervisory Deputy U.S. Marshal 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00021324
